page.title: 09GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: Here are two local games. {RECORDS}_ This is based on football. One player is in goal. Every one else is outfield. The keeper kicks the ball out and and someone must pass the ball to a second player. A goal can only be scored by a volley or a header. If a player scores then he becomes keeper. If he misses, the keeper then takes a penalty against him and if a goal is scored he stays keeper if not he returns outfield.The object of the game is to get the{record}number of goals against one keeper. When the keeper changes the game begins again. {CHINKS}_ This is played by girls. Elastic bands are tied together. Two people hold the ends while the rest jump over. The height of the rope increases. If a player does not succeed in clearing the rope it becomes her turn to hold an end.
